subject: Restructure to image-first workflow
body:
- Settings (fit, position, filters) now stored per-image instead of per-cell
- New workflow: upload images → select image → apply settings → assign to cells
- Image library shows selected image with highlight
- Assign to Cells section lets you toggle cell assignments for selected image
- Same image in multiple cells shares the same settings
- Updated useAdState, MediaTab, AdCanvas for new data structure
title: Restructure to image-first workflow
